meanings.definition: A sequence of actions regularly followed; a fixed program.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, my daily routine includes brushing my teeth and making breakfast.
meanings.sent2: Her morning routine consists of jogging in the park and then reading the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: During the magic show, the rabbit decided to switch up the routine and perform a card trick instead.
meanings.sent4: The routine of the waves crashing against the shore lulled me to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The strict routine of the factory assembly line kept everything running smoothly.

meanings.definition: A set of customary and often mechanically performed procedures or activities.
meanings.sent1: The chef followed the routine of chopping vegetables before starting to cook.
meanings.sent2: The morning routine at the office involved checking emails and attending the daily meeting.
meanings.sent3: The routine of the robot vacuum cleaner amused the family cat, who tried to chase it around the house.
meanings.sent4: The routine of the train schedule was disrupted by unexpected snowfall.
meanings.sent5: The routine of the dance practice made the performance flawless and synchronized.
